Articles.Content:
I cannot find anything cheating about your post.

That is cheating.

CHEATER!

[quote name='Red Iron Crown']Excessive punctuation? Cheating is not just a hobby for you, it's a way of life. Good sentences have at most two punctuation marks.[/QUOTE]

And a grammar flag on the play. I've corrected it here:

[quote name='Red Iron Crown']Excessive punctuation? Cheating is not just a hobby for you, it's a way of life. Good sentences have[B][COLOR="#FF0000"],[/COLOR][/B] at most[B][COLOR="#FF0000"],[/COLOR][/B] two punctuation marks.[/QUOTE]

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Calling someone who has not cheated a cheater? That obviously deflects your attempt to cheat!
Flags? This ain't football, cheater. Here we don't use silly rulebooks, we just call each other out directly.
Only a cheater would claim that politeness is cheating. CHEATER! :cool:

You got to call Red Iron Crown a cheater? That's impossible!

CHEATOR!!!
Y u no postz moar? U is nit has same join dat as me? This thing is we call, cheating, CHEATEROR!
To steal my spelling of cheater is cheating, CHEATOR!!!!
You can't use different spellings of cheater, cheater!
you can't say cheater twice, CHEATER!
You just did exactly what you said was cheating, CHEATOR!
That spacecraft in you avatar isn't stock to KSP you dirty mod using CHEATOR!

Y U..
THAT sir is an OFFICIAL SQUAD MOD!

CHEATARATOR!
Asteroid day is not an official holiday, CHEATOR!
Well, it's an official MOD you assuming little CHEATERATOR!
You ban me, yet you are not a mod? CHEATOR!
Hey! I want some Dres too you CHEATERATOR!
Then use hyperedit, CHEATOR.

Hyperedit is for wimps and posers. Do it for real.

Che-e-e-ator. :D
Stop cheating at English. You aren't allowed to stretch out words in writing. Cheater.
Grammar Nazis cheat their way through comments to find errors. Congrats, cheater.
Exclamation point in a username? Cheating. What if someone wants to ask you a question, Kaboom!? Good usernames let other people pick their own punctuation.
Last two posts are exactly an hour apart. Obviously cheating because coincidences [I]never[/I] happen in real life.
You posted directly above me. Clearly a plot! Cheater.

WHAT IS THIS RIGHT HERE?
A reputation that can't be measured? Simply cheating.
BECOMING A TELEMETRY OFFICER?? how dare you not be a Space Officer. YOU Cheater
